argument.description: The root dir of the package that needs to analyze.

analyze.description: Recursively analyze node_modules by dependency analysis.

scope.description: The scope of dependencies to detect.

json.description: Output result as JSON file, otherwise will start the website view.

noweb.description: Do not start the website view after analyzing.

format.description: Automatically format JSON file to a more pretty looking.

host.description: The host the website opens on.

port.description: The port the website opens on.

proto.description: Output result as the original recursive tree structure without converting it into diagram.

console.description: Print the result on the console.

manager.description: The package manager of the target project.

detect.description: Recursively scan and detect the packages exists in the target package node_modules.

argument.description: The root dir of the package that needs to detect.

show.description: Show all detected packages on the console.

count.description: Only show amount of detected packages.

raw.description: Show without converting into tree diagram.

view.description: Open a JSON file of data of package dependencies in website view.

get.description: Get the information of the package from 'registry.npmjs.org'.

argument.description: The name or id of the package.

version.description: The version range of the package.

all.description: Auto get all versions of the package which satisfy the version range described by the option -v, otherwise will get the latest.

line.input.name: Package name
line.input.extraAnalyze: Do you want to analyze extraneous packages?
